CommandDefinition.Name: removeinheritancerule
CommandDefinition.Description: Removes a parameter inheritance rule from an ordertype.

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: The ordertype the inheritance rule should be removed from.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: parameterType
Argument.Description: The type of the parameter. Valid types are: MonitoringLevel

Argument.Name: childFilter
Argument.Description: The filter of the child ordertype hierarchy of the inheritance rule to be removed. If not set the inheritance rule for the own ordertype will be removed.
